name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.203.4
- Fixed Fissure

v1.203.3
- Fixed bugs with Wiretap, Hane Hane, Exodia, Shadow Toon, Millennium Shield, Millennium Key

v1.203.0
- Added 3 new cards: Jerry Beans Man, Reinforcements, Ultimate Offering
- Fixed Grasschopper
- Adjusted several cards such as Polymerization that replay cards but do not have the Resummon keyword. These cards will now charge Tributes when a Tribute monster is chosen. Other cards with similar wording have been changed to include the Resummon keyword instead
- Fixed Trap Hole bug
- Various balancing adjustments
- When playing with the Dragon Deck, the Millennium Puzzle now grants an extra effect at the start of combat. In future builds other decks will have similar effects
- Fixed Mausoleum of the Emperor bug


Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
Discord: Nyoxide#3464
